description: This file provides a client interface for interacting with Supabase backend services, including authentication functions such as sign in, sign out, and retrieving the current user. It also initializes and configures a Supabase client using environment variables, with fallback mock implementations when credentials are not set.

methods.name: getSupabaseClient()
methods.description: Creates and returns a configured Supabase client instance using environment variables REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL and REACT_APP_SUPABASE_KEY. If these variables are missing, returns null and logs a warning.

methods.name: signInWithEmailPassword(email, password)
methods.description: Signs in a user with email and password using Supabase authentication. Provides a mock response if Supabase credentials are not set.

methods.name: signOut()
methods.description: Signs out the current user session from Supabase. Returns immediately with no error if Supabase client is not configured.

methods.name: getCurrentUser()
methods.description: Retrieves the currently authenticated user from Supabase. Provides a mock response if Supabase client is not configured.
